seo.title: Getting started
seo.description: Don't know where to start with Castopod? Find all of the resources here: download and install Castopod, read the documentation, file new issues or request a feature, translate Castopod in your language, and come chat with the community!

turnkey.title: Turnkey offers
turnkey.description: Get your own Castopod instance in just <0>5 minutes</0>!<1>No maintenance, no strings attached.

requirements: Requires PHP 8.1 and MySQL 5.7 or MariaDB version 10.3 or greater.
installDescription: You can easily self-host Castopod on your own server using one of the following methods:
documentationDescription: For more insights, read the documentation to understand how Castopod works.
issueTrackerDescription: Found a bug or would like to submit a feature request? Head on to Castopod's issue tracker.
translateDescription: Help bring Castopod to your region of the world by translating it in your language!
chatDescription: Come and meet fellow podcasters, ask for help, and reach out to developers.
